intro:
Menu to import, export, integrate, and delete datasets.

Integration is needed for differential expression analysis across conditions, pathway analysis, and drug queries.

Disabled for demo.

Select an integrated single cell dataset to explore.

Selection required for tour.

Select comparison type.

clusters to identify cell-types and marker genes.

samples to run differential expression, abundance, and pathway analyses across groups of samples.

Select samples for tour.
Click to specify group names for samples.

After specifying sample groups, select a test and then a control group to compare.

Selection required for tour.

Select a cluster to sort genes by FDR across groups.

Selection required for tour.

Download differential expression and pathway analyses for the selected cluster.

Download includes differential abundance analysis for all clusters.

Select a gene to plot for this intro.

Selection required for tour.

Dimensionality reduction plot of clusters and associated labels.

Click to toggle differential abundance overlay.
Dimensionality reduction plots split by group for the selected feature.

Violin plot shows distribution of selected feature in the selected cluster for each sample.

Sorted by average logcounts.
Click to toggle differential expression overlay for the selected feature.

Search for gene of interest.

paste the Genes column of downloaded Gene Ontology results to explore DE genes for a pathway.
